00015 #define SY_alloc(_type,_amt) malloc(sizeof(_type)*amt)
00016 #define SY_calloc(_type,_amt) calloc(sizeof(_type),amt)
00017 #define SY_free(_obj) free(_obj);

00019     typedef const char * SY_file_t;
00020     typedef SY_file_t SY_bundle_t;

00022     // List stuff
00023 
00024     struct SY_list_node {
00025         void * contents;
00026         SY_list_node * next;
00027         SY_list_node * previous;
00028     };
00029 
00030     typedef struct SY_list {
00031         size_t length;
00032         struct SY_list_node * first;
00033         struct SY_list_node * last;
00034     } SY_list;
00035 
00036     extern SY_list * SY_list_new();
00037     extern void SY_list_destroy(SY_list * self);
00038     extern void SY_list_append(SY_list * self, void * append);
00039     extern void * SY_list_pop(SY_list * self);
00040 
00041     typedef struct SY_iterator {
00042         SY_list_node * current;
00043     } SY_iterator;
00044 
00045     extern SY_iterator * SY_iterator_new(SY_list * list);
00046     extern void SY_iterator_destroy(SY_iterator * self);
00047     extern void * SY_iterator_current(SY_iterator * self);
00048     extern bool SY_iterator_forward(SY_iterator * self);
00049     extern bool SY_iterator_backward(SY_iterator * self);
00050     extern void SY_iterator_insert(SY_iterator * self, void * p);
00051     extern void SY_iterator_remove(SY_iterator * self);

00053     // End of list stuff

00055     struct SY_app_impl {
00056         SY_file_t(*locate_binary)();
00057         SY_file_t(*locate_resource)(SY_file_t name);
00058         SY_file_t(*locate_prefix)();
00059         bool(*has_bundle)();
00060         SY_bundle_t(*locate_bundle)();
00061     };
00062 
00063     #define SY_predeclare_app_impl(name) \
00064     extern SY_file_t   SY_##name##_locate_binary(); \
00065     extern SY_file_t   SY_##name##_locate_resource(SY_file_t name); \
00066     extern SY_file_t   SY_##name##_locate_prefix(); \
00067     extern bool        SY_##name##_has_bundle(); \
00068     extern SY_bundle_t SY_##name##_locate_bundle()
00069 
00070     SY_predeclare_app_impl(LB); // Linux bundle
00071     SY_predeclare_app_impl(LF); // Linux FHS
00072     SY_predeclare_app_impl(MB); // Mac bundle
00073     SY_predeclare_app_impl(MF); // Mac FHS
00074     SY_predeclare_app_impl(Woe); // Woe32
00075 
00076     #define SY_decl_app_impl(name) \
00077     extern struct SY_app_impl SY_##name##_app_impl
00078 
00079     SY_decl_app_impl(LB);
00080     SY_decl_app_impl(LF);
00081     SY_decl_app_impl(MB);
00082     SY_decl_app_impl(MF);
00083     SY_decl_app_impl(Woe);
00084 
00085     #define SY_def_app_impl(name) \
00086     struct SY_app_impl SY_##name##_app_impl = { \
00087         .locate_binary   = SY_##name##_locate_binary; \
00088         .locate_resource = SY_##name##_locate_resource; \
00089         .locate_prefix   = SY_##name##_locate_prefix; \
00090         .has_bundle      = SY_##name##_has_bundle; \
00091         .locate_bunlde   = SY_##name##_locate_bunlde; \
00092     }
00093

00095      This is because C++ doesn't understand this syntax */
